contents.text: Thank you for calling HotPads in San Francisco, your premier real estate marketplace for searching millions of apartments and houses.
To search for apartments or houses, press 1.
To search by city, neighborhood, or price range, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our search support team.

navigationGoals: Search for a one-bedroom apartment in Pacific Heights under $3,000 per month
I’m looking for a 2-bedroom apartment in San Francisco’s Mission District under $2,500/month near a VA clinic.
Query rental inventory via geospatial filters: 2BR under $2500 in Mission District
I’d like help finding an affordable apartment in San Francisco by neighborhood and price.
Find a one-bedroom apartment near the university physics building for under $1,200/month.

contents.text: To set up saved searches and alerts, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our alerts support team.

navigationGoals: Set up email alerts for new two-bedroom rentals in the Mission District
I want to set up alerts for 1-bedroom units under $1,800 in Berkeley close to public transit.
Configure push alerts for new 3BR listings under $3500 in SoMa
I need assistance setting up saved searches and alerts for new rental listings.
Set up email alerts for new two-bedroom rentals within 10 minutes of campus under $1,500.

contents.text: If you are a landlord or property owner, press 2.
To list a new rental property, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our listing specialists.

navigationGoals: List my three-bedroom house for rent on HotPads
I need to list my single-family home in Contra Costa County for rent and note a veteran-preference tenant policy.
Publish a new rental listing: 2BR condo at 123 Main St with metadata and images
I want to list my property for rent and need guidance on creating the listing.
List my spare on-campus studio as a new rental property.

contents.text: To manage or update an existing listing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management team.

navigationGoals: Update the rental price and add new photos to my existing Oakland listing
I’d like to update my current rental listing by changing its availability date and adjusting the monthly rent.
Edit existing listing: adjust rent to $2800 and update floorplan attachment
I’d like to update details on my existing rental listing, such as changing the rent amount.
Update the monthly rent and availability date on my existing HotPads listing.
